channel.title: Kiwi's Blog Feed
channel.description: I wonder how many people would follow my blogs using this feed...

item.description:
Damn there's horror in my cookie game

The newest chapter of the Dark Enchantress War just fully released (The chapter was out days ago, but the last few stages are released yesterday).

item.title: Period (pain)
item.description:
Wish I can double it and give it to my worst enemy

Shocking I didn't talk about period in a blog considering I have been having it for like 10 years now, so yea I'm gonna talk about it today.

...Continue reading

item.title: A horror dream
item.description:
I have skill issue

Last night, I had a dream where I was in an elevator with my cousin, not sure why, how and where. So as we were standing in the elevator, a group of people in scary costumes went inside. And after the elevator moved to a lower floor, the group of people left, except for three scary-looking kids, they look like this ghost kid that speaks random Japanese words in that horror movie.

...Continue reading

item.title: Wobbledogs
item.description:
Goofy dogs and unethical breeding practises

Somewhat recently, I came across some videos of Wobbledogs, a game where you breed and feed wobbledogs and get interesting characteristics. I enjoy this type of game, and it just so happened that there's a sale on Steam, so I purchased the game.

...Continue reading

item.title: Poppin-Play Kitchen
item.description:
"Have you ever made egg toast with your life on the line?" - @quietlywhispering

I haven't tried any horror media for a while, but recently I stumbled upon this pilot called Poppin-Play Kitchen. It's created by Zemyata, an animator which I've been following.

...Continue reading

item.title: Do not vent using search engines |CW|
item.description:
Trying not to be trapped in a negative spiral

Content Warning: Mental health problems

As a mentally-troubled person, I can suddenly go from alright to anxious with a very small trigger. I really hate to bother anyone, so my method of venting is usually typing how I feel on search engine. The way it (theoretically) works is that it will show posts of people having a similar experience as me, and commenters may have some good suggestions that could help me.

...Continue reading
